timeline.bodyText: Style... could these be if (...) { return ... } else if (...) { return ... } else { return ...} - having the returns at the same indent and in an else-if chain I find increases readability.  It makes the effect explicit, if X then A, if Y then B, otherwise C.
timeline.author: shemnon
timeline.diffHunk:

     if ("STOP".equals(frame.getOpcode()) && transactionTrace.getTraceFrames().size() == 1) {
